content: I just signed up, so my review is based strictly on the set up process. I have heard good things from others, and I think this app/card/program will be helpful with my child. BUT the signup process is very "scammy." Not only the upsell of trying to get you to sign up for various higher cost plans that include investments (so many push notifications until disabled!) The bigger issue is the "standard" vs "customized" card. As you are setting up, every step directs you back to the customized card. There is NO WHERE to set up and order a standard card. What they don't tell you anywhere in the process of signing up is that you get a standard card automatically once your bank sync verifies. Indeed, I got a push notification after I was able to verify my bank that told me my "next step" was to order the card and it directed me to the customized card. I looked everywhere for how to get the regular card that doesn't cost extra. No info on the app, no confirmation email telling me it was automatically ordered. I texted the number provided on the app for help. To their credit, customer service was quick to get back to me and they let me know that the standard card was automatically ordered. They also went to my account to verify for me that it was indeed in process. Now WHY CAN'T I get that same info on my own account?! This is clearly designed to TRICK YOU into getting the customized card. The app directs you to do that multiple times during the set up. Nowhere does it tell you, that you already have a regular one coming. And you have to actually speak to customer service to verify a standard card was ordered since there was NO CONFIRMATION of this in my email nor in my app. I told customer service to please pass along my feedback as this comes across as, at best, an unclear and frustrating system, and at worst, VERY SHADY. Please change the process to be TRANSPARENT. You shouldn't have to dig so deep to find out that the customized extra fee card is actually....completely optional. I'm sure they make a lot of extra money of this setup but for me, it is a big turnoff. I will look for a system that is more transparent about additional optional fees.
